Uses of Class
rpgonline.post.ShaderEffect

  • Packages that use ShaderEffect 
    Package Description
    rpgonline.post
    A package containing post processing effects for frames.

    • Uses of ShaderEffect in rpgonline.post

      Subclasses of ShaderEffect in rpgonline.post 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BrightnessEffect
      An effect that brightens the screen.
      class  ColorBoostEffect
      Deprecated. 
      class  ColorEffectsShader
      A shader that effects the colours on the screen.
      class  ContrastEffect
      An effect that modifies the contrast of the screen.
      class  DynamicHeatShader
      A heat shader effect that changes over time.
      class  EdgeResample
      Deprecated. 
      class  FragmentExpose
      Provides over exposure effect
      class  FXAA
      An implementation of FXAA anti-aliasing.
      class  GammaEffect
      An effect that modifies the gamma of the screen to convert from linear to SRGB values.
      class  HeatShader
      A shader creating a heat effect.
      class  HighPass
      A filter that sets all values below a threshold to black.
      class  HueShiftEffect
      An effect that changes the hue of an image.
      class  LowExpose
      A low quality but faster over exposure effect.
      class  NoiseEffect
      Deprecated. 
      class  SaturateShader
      An effect that changes the saturation of the screen.
      class  ThemeEffect
      An effect which shifts colors to a consistent palette.
      class  VibranceEffect
      An effect that changes the vibrance of the screen.
